alert.note: Alert for Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:11PM CDT until June 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN STEPHENS AND SOUTHWESTERN PALO PINTO COUNTIES... At 511 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Gordon, or 15 miles northeast of Ranger, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Lake Palo Pinto, Caddo, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Strawn and Mingus. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
